descriptors.name: wifi_asset_tracking
descriptors.label: Wi-Fi - Asset Tracking
descriptors.description: This application demonstrates how to configure the SiWG917 module as an Azure device endpoint and how to establish a connection with Azure IoT Hub. This project contains Development of a Wi-Fi tracker application on the SiWG917-PK6031A that will be connected to Wi-Fi access point using WLAN APIs provided by the WiSeConnect 3 SDK. Communicates with Azure IoT Hub based on the configurations provided by the developer through the JSON messages containig the following fields.

properties.value: Capability|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Wifi

descriptors.name: wifi_weather_display
descriptors.label: Wi-Fi - Weather Display
descriptors.description: This project demonstrates a weather display powered by the SiWx917 microcontroller. It retrieves real-time weather data from the OpenWeatherMap API, synchronizes the current date and time using the NTP protocol, and monitors indoor temperature and humidity using the Si70xx sensor on the WSTK development kit.

properties.value: Capability|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Wifi
